Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product which has been meticulously designed and developed to cater to your needs. This product comes with cutting-edge features and unparalleled performance, making it an invaluable asset. Considering its exceptional quality and capabilities, we're offering it to you at a special introductory price of $7500. This exclusive opportunity won't last long, so I encourage you to consider this offer carefully. Should you have any questions or need more information, please feel free to reach out. Looking forward to serving you! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $7,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $7,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
